Title: Relates to assessment of the record of performance of banking institutions in supporting persons and certain entities affected by the outbreak of COVID-19
Summary: Provides for assessment of activities conducted by the banking institution to support persons, small businesses, minority- and women-owned businesses, and certain not-for-profit corporations affected by the outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to assessment of the record of performance of banking institutions in supporting persons, small businesses, minority- and women-owned businesses, and certain not-for-profit corporations affected by the outbreak of COVID-19
